mapper.select: SELECT p.ID, p.OPTIONS_ID, p.CATEGORIES_ID, c.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, p.ID AS PRODUCTS_ID, p.NAME, p.DESCRIPTION, p.PRICE, p.PRODUCT_IMG, p.STOCK_CHECK, p.STOCK, IF(oc.ORDER_COUNT >= 100, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_POPULAR, IF(p.CREATED_AT >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 WEEK, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_NEW, IF(rp.PRODUCTS_ID IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_RECOMMENDED FROM PRODUCTS p LEFT JOIN CATEGORIES c ON p.CATEGORIES_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.PRODUCTS_ID, COUNT(oi.ID) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM ORDER_ITEMS oi JOIN ORDERS o ON oi.ORDERS_ID = o.ID WHERE o.STATUS = 'PAID' GROUP BY oi.PRODUCTS_ID ) oc ON p.ID = oc.PRODUCTS_ID LEFT JOIN RECOMMENDED_PRODUCTS rp ON p.ID = rp.PRODUCTS_ID ORDER BY p.seq ASC;

SELECT p.ID, p.OPTIONS_ID, p.CATEGORIES_ID, c.NAME AS CATEGORY_NAME, p.ID AS PRODUCTS_ID, p.NAME, p.DESCRIPTION, p.PRICE, p.PRODUCT_IMG, p.STOCK_CHECK, p.STOCK, IF(oc.ORDER_COUNT >= 100, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_POPULAR, IF(p.CREATED_AT >= NOW() - INTERVAL 2 WEEK, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_NEW, IF(rp.PRODUCTS_ID IS NOT NULL, TRUE, FALSE) AS IS_RECOMMENDED FROM PRODUCTS p JOIN CATEGORIES c ON p.CATEGORIES_ID = c.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT oi.PRODUCTS_ID, COUNT(oi.ID) AS ORDER_COUNT FROM ORDER_ITEMS oi JOIN ORDERS o ON oi.ORDERS_ID = o.ID WHERE o.STATUS = 'PAID' GROUP BY oi.PRODUCTS_ID ) oc ON p.ID = oc.PRODUCTS_ID LEFT JOIN RECOMMENDED_PRODUCTS rp ON p.ID = rp.PRODUCTS_ID WHERE p.CATEGORIES_ID = #{id} ORDER BY p.seq ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO products ( id, name, categories_id, options_id, price, product_img,seq ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{categoriesId}, #{optionsId}, #{price}, #{productImg} , #{seq} )
